sen.j: 池田町洋館街（いけだまちようかんがい）は滋賀県近江八幡市旧市街の一角の名称。
sen.e: Ikeda-machi Yokangai is a name given to a part of the old town area of Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.
Ikeda-machi Yokangai is a name given to a part of the old town area of Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.
Ikeda-machi Yokangai is a name given to a part of the old town area of Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 建築家ウィリアム・メレル・ヴォーリズが近江八幡で最初に設計した現存する3棟の大正時代築の西洋館で構成される。
sen.e: It consists of 3 Western-style homes which were built in the Taisho Period and exist to this day in the city, as well as being some of the first in the city to be designed by William Merrell VORIES.

It consists of 3 Western-style residences which were built in the Taisho Period and exist to this day in the city, as well as being some of the first in the city to be designed by William Merrell VORIES.

It consists of 3 Western-style residences which were built in the Taisho Period and exist to this day in the city, as well as being some of the first in the city to be designed by William Merrell VORIES.

sen.j: 旧ウォーターハウス邸― 1913年（大正2）築
sen.e: The old Waterhouse residence - built in 1913
The old Waterhouse residence - built in 1913
The old Waterhouse residence - built in 1913

sen.j: 早稲田大学の元教師・ウォーターハウス氏の住宅。
切妻造、3階建、煙突と暖炉4箇所の邸宅。
sen.e: Three-story home with gable roof and 4 chimneys and fireplaces.
Three-storey residence with gable roof and 4 chimneys and fireplaces.
Three-storey residence with gable roof and 4 chimneys and fireplaces.
The old Yoshida residence - built in 1913
The old Yoshida residence - built in 1913
The old Yoshida residence - built in 1913

sen.j: 近江兄弟社創業者の一人、吉田悦蔵氏の邸宅。
sen.e: Home of Etsuzo YOSHIDA, one of the founders of Omi Brotherhood Co., Ltd.
Residence of Etsuzo YOSHIDA, one of the founders of Omi Brotherhood Co., Ltd.
Residence of Etsuzo YOSHIDA, one of the founders of Omi Brotherhood Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 旧ヴォーリズ邸― 1914年（大正3）築（現存せず）
sen.e: The old Vories residence - built in 1914 (no longer in existence)
The old Vories residence - built in 1914 (no longer in existence)
The old Vories residence - built in 1914 (no longer in existence)

sen.j: たねや本店2階喫茶室に旧ヴォーリズ邸在りし時代の洋館街の陶器製模型が展示されており、当時の街の雰囲気にふれることができる。
sen.e: Taneya main shop has in the tea shop on the second floor a ceramic scale mockup of the Yokangai during the times when the Vories residence was still standing, offering a glimpse of the past.
Taneya main shop has in the tea room on the second floor a ceramic scale model of the Yokangai during the times when the Vories residence was still standing, offering a glimpse of the past.
sen.cmt: shop → roommockup → model（mockupだと実物大模型）
sen.e: Taneya main shop has in the tea room on the second floor a ceramic scale model of the Yokangai during the times when the Vories residence was still standing, offering a glimpse of the past.

sen.j: ダブルハウス― 1921年（大正10）築
近江ミッション（近江兄弟社の前身）の社員用の二世帯用住宅。
sen.e: A duplex belonging to Omi Mission (predecessor of Omi Brotherhood) used by company employees and their families.
A duplex belonging to Omi Mission (predecessor of Omi Brotherhood) used by company employees and their families.
A duplex belonging to Omi Mission (predecessor of Omi Brotherhood) used by company employees and their families.

sen.j: 〒523-0877 滋賀県近江八幡市池田町5丁目
近江鉄道 近江八幡駅 徒歩20分
